There will be a day when you hold them on your hip for the very last time.
There will be a day when you've made your final bubble beard,...
...a day when you will no longer be greeted like a hero...
...or get the privilege of carrying them up to bed in your arms.
Nothing can prepare you for these days,...
...just as nothing can prepare you for the day...
...when they finally understand how much you love them.
